original_title: Darren Hayes: Too Close For Comfort
overview: A concert tour film, recorded all over the world, back stage and on stage in 2002. Featuring live versions of 'Insatiable' 'Strange Relationship' 'Affirmation' 'Truly Madly Deeply' and more. Plus a behind the scenes documentary that captures the turbulent transition from being the lead singer of one of the biggest pop bands in the world at that time, to a new solo career.
title: Darren Hayes: Too Close For Comfort
